_source.content: The Animals (also billed as Eric Burdon and the Animals) are an English rhythm-and-blues and rock band, formed in Newcastle upon Tyne in the early 1960s. The band moved to London upon finding fame in 1964. The Animals were known for their gritty, bluesy sound and deep-voiced frontman Eric Burdon, as exemplified by their signature song and transatlantic number-one hit single "The House of the Rising Sun" as well as by hits such as "We Gotta Get Out of This Place", "It's My Life", "Don't Bring Me Down", "I'm Crying", "See See Rider" and "Don't Let Me Be Misunderstood." The band balanced tough, rock-edged pop singles against rhythm-and-blues-oriented album material and were part of the British Invasion of the US.The Animals underwent numerous personnel changes in the mid-1960s, and suffered from poor business management, leading the original incarnation to split up in 1966. Burdon assembled a mostly new lineup of musicians under the name Eric Burdon and the Animals; the much-changed act moved to California and achieved commercial success as a psychedelic and hard rock band with hits such as "San Franciscan Nights", "When I Was Young" and "Sky Pilot" before disbanding at the end of the decade. Altogether, the group had 10 top-20 hits in both the UK Singles Chart and the US Billboard Hot 100.The original lineup of Burdon, Alan Price, Chas Chandler, Hilton Valentine and John Steel reunited for a one-off benefit concert in Newcastle in 1968. They later launched brief comebacks in 1975 and 1983. Several partial regroupings of the original-era members have occurred since then under various names. The Animals were inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 1994. card.description: The compromising church alters the word of God because of opposition Soon in America, preaching from specific Bible passages dealing with human sexuality may be illegal
card.title: 8 contrasts between the confessing and compromising church

_source.content: 8 contrasts between the confessing and compromising churchBy Joseph Mattera, Op-ed Contributor| Saturday, September 24, 2022Preaching the Gospel? Get Used to the Blowback!During the days of Nazi Germany, there arose a Confessing Church movement that rose against the German Church movement, which became the religious arm of the Fascist Nazi Socialist movement. Of the 18,000 pastors in Germany during that time (from 1933 to 1945), less than 5,000 were aligned with the Confessing Church.Hence, only a remnant held fast to the biblical position, with about half of the confessing churches eventually conforming due to political and societal pressure.Unfortunately, this demonstrates that when push comes to shove, many pastors, churches, and so-called Christians will probably bow to pressure and allow the norms of culture to become their credo for Christianity.According to Eric Metaxas' book on Dietrich Bonhoeffer, Hitler once said, “You can do anything you want with pastors, they will submit. They are insignificant little people, submissive as dogs and they will sweat with embarrassment when you talk to them.” This sounds like some of the contemporary pastors in Western culture who always acquiesce to cultural “group think.”With the accelerated pace of the attack on religious liberty today, there could develop a great divide in the church between confessing churches and compromising churches, similar to what happened in Nazi Germany. This will not be a divide based on denominational affiliation but based on the degree of loyalty to biblical fidelity. It is sad but true that more and more believers will compromise core biblical values and standards rather than be stigmatized or persecuted, losing influence in society. We see this in churches in the United States and beyond.In John 12:42-43, we see that many contemporaries of Jesus believed in Him but would not confess Him because they loved the praise of men more than the praise of God.The following are contrasts between the confessing church and the compromising church:1. In the confessing church, Christ is over culture. The compromising church accommodates Christ to culture.The confessing church believes Jesus is Lord over all creation. Hence, it attempts to reflect Christ in every area of culture. The compromising church has a posture of accommodation. Therefore, the Christ they believe in and preach is shaped by the culture it lives in.2. The confessing church holds fast to God's word despite opposition.The compromising church alters the word of God because of opposition. Soon in America, preaching from specific Bible passages dealing with human sexuality may be illegal. Because of this, many will alter their theology to fit the culture, while the confessing church will preach the word of God despite governmental fines, penalties, lawsuits, and even serving time in jail.3. The confessing church puts the Kingdom of God above culture and ethnicity. The compromising church puts its ethnicity before the Kingdom of God.The German church, during the Nazi era, put nationalism and their Aryan heritage above the word of God. Many pastors and believers today view the scriptures more through their ethnicity and national heritage than through proper exegesis of scripture. When our nation officially makes biblical Christianity illegal, we will soon see who will be the confessors and who will be the compromisers. In many ways, practicing biblical Christianity is already unlawful when it comes to believers attempting to walk out of their faith in the marketplace. 8 contrasts between the confessing and compromising church

By Joseph Mattera, Op-ed Contributor| Saturday, September 24, 2022

Preaching the Gospel? Get Used to the Blowback!

During the days of Nazi Germany, there arose a Confessing Church movement that rose against the German Church movement, which became the religious arm of the Fascist Nazi Socialist movement. Of the 18,000 pastors in Germany during that time (from 1933 to 1945), less than 5,000 were aligned with the Confessing Church.

Hence, only a remnant held fast to the biblical position, with about half of the confessing churches eventually conforming due to political and societal pressure.

Unfortunately, this demonstrates that when push comes to shove, many pastors, churches, and so-called Christians will probably bow to pressure and allow the norms of culture to become their credo for Christianity.

According to Eric Metaxas' book on Dietrich Bonhoeffer, Hitler once said, “You can do anything you want with pastors, they will submit. They are insignificant little people, submissive as dogs and they will sweat with embarrassment when you talk to them.” This sounds like some of the contemporary pastors in Western culture who always acquiesce to cultural “group think.”

With the accelerated pace of the attack on religious liberty today, there could develop a great divide in the church between confessing churches and compromising churches, similar to what happened in Nazi Germany. This will not be a divide based on denominational affiliation but based on the degree of loyalty to biblical fidelity. It is sad but true that more and more believers will compromise core biblical values and standards rather than be stigmatized or persecuted, losing influence in society. We see this in churches in the United States and beyond.

In John 12:42-43, we see that many contemporaries of Jesus believed in Him but would not confess Him because they loved the praise of men more than the praise of God.

The following are contrasts between the confessing church and the compromising church:

1. In the confessing church, Christ is over culture. The compromising church accommodates Christ to culture.

The confessing church believes Jesus is Lord over all creation. Hence, it attempts to reflect Christ in every area of culture. The compromising church has a posture of accommodation. Therefore, the Christ they believe in and preach is shaped by the culture it lives in.

2. The confessing church holds fast to God's word despite opposition.

The compromising church alters the word of God because of opposition. Soon in America, preaching from specific Bible passages dealing with human sexuality may be illegal. Because of this, many will alter their theology to fit the culture, while the confessing church will preach the word of God despite governmental fines, penalties, lawsuits, and even serving time in jail.

3. The confessing church puts the Kingdom of God above culture and ethnicity. The compromising church puts its ethnicity before the Kingdom of God.

The German church, during the Nazi era, put nationalism and their Aryan heritage above the word of God. Many pastors and believers today view the scriptures more through their ethnicity and national heritage than through proper exegesis of scripture. When our nation officially makes biblical Christianity illegal, we will soon see who will be the confessors and who will be the compromisers. In many ways, practicing biblical Christianity is already unlawful when it comes to believers attempting to walk out of their faith in the marketplace. For instance, many private Christian-owned businesses do not have the same level of protection today as local churches.

Hollywood actor Lucas Black steps away from secular entertainment to create family-friendly content

4. The confessing church alters its methods of preaching. The compromising church alters the message they preach.

While it is wise and biblical for the body of Christ to be relevant to culture regarding the preaching of the Gospel, it should never put being relevant above being faithful. The compromising church puts being relevant before biblical faithfulness. Hence, it changes not only the method of preaching but also the message it preaches.

5. The confessing church is a remnant in the minority of church and state. The compromising church wants to be in the mainstream of both church and state.

The confessing church endures long seasons of feeling like aliens and strangers in its community. The compromising church wants to be in the mainstream culture more than living in the divine flow of God’s favor and presence.

read more>

https://www.christianpost.com/voices/8-contrasts-between-the-confessing-and-compromising-church.html

Good morning❗ ☕🇺🇸

✝️ 📜🌄
Daily Bible verse
A river flowed out of Eden to water the garden, and there it divided and became four rivers.
Genesis 2:10

🌄 Morning prayer
Lord, Your Word says that Your people perish for lack of knowledge. Flood our
land with Your knowledge, let it flow into our government, our schools, our
churches and our homes, streams of knowledge, rivers of understanding. Do it Lord, please do it. *
🙏 In Jesus' name we pray. Amen.

🌄 Don’t discount small beginnings, acorns turn into massive oak trees, over time springs become rivers and a tiny idea can become a life changing accomplishment.
Let's all make the day count.*

*Charlie Daniels

📣 It's Sunday, September 25, 2022, and the Obama/Biden administration was/(is) the most corrupt in US history. #Obamagate.
- Dan Bongino

⏱💣 1 Year and 248 Days of a "hostage situation." -Juanita Broaddrick

🇺🇸🖋️Biden Executive actions: 574 as of September 22, 2022, including 99 executive orders, 101 presidential memoranda, 313 proclamations, and 61 notices. (Ballotpedia)
The Biden Recession is here. Unemployment rate ticked up to 3.7%. The labor force participation rate rose to 62.4% in August. Still, 50% of employers anticipate job cuts in the next six months.
Feds have raised the interest rates 5 times this year. Mortgage interest rates are over 6%. Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell vows to keep at it until the job (of beating inflation) is done. At the rate Joe and Congress spend our money, I don't see how they can keep up. The feds raised interest rates .75 percentage points for the 3rd straight time on Wednesday.
Gas is $3.70/gallon.⬆️ (AAA) Uh-oh, it's already going back up. Inflation is 8.3%.😡 DOW tumbled 1,276 points for its worst day in 2 years.

RCP averages: Joe's job approval rating spread is -10.1%.
His job approval avg: 43.%. (Reuters says 39%, -18 spread.)

Build The Wall
DC mayor Bowser is upset that her city shelters are being "overrun" with illegal aliens. In response, she has issued a limited public health emergency. At least 3 buses of illegals were unloaded in front of Kamala's Naval Observatory residence. Don't let up now, Gov. Abbott ❗
Eric Adams has opened 14 luxury hotels in NYC free to the illegals. Nearly 5 MILLION illegals have skipped across Joe's border already. TX Gov Abbott has now added Chicago to the destination list for illegals. Mayor Lightfoot is immediately busing them out to the suburbs.
Ron DeSantis sent 2 planes of illegals to Martha's Vineyard and the dems went berserk. 125 National Guard were immediately deployed to escort the 50 illegals out of the snobby neighborhood that says they welcome ALL. Using this model, we would need 12,500,000 Ice Agents at the border to eliminate the invasion.
Next stop: Joe's place in Wilmington, DE❓ DeSantis makes light of any lawsuits or investigations targeting him. I say, sue the Big Guy in the OO❗

On Covid
Ahead of the election, the CDC relaxes its stance on Covid and allows people to make their own decisions since 95% of Americans 16 and older have some resistance toCovid-19 ❗ The 🐘 in the room: "Young, healthy people are dying in large numbers by collapsing". No, the NIH still does NOT advise using ivermectin to treat Covid-19 except in clinical trials. The NIH is years behind the data and efficacy, and thousands have died because of it.
➡️ The UK starts paying out big bucks for injuries and deaths caused by the experimental Covid jab.⬅️

Current events.
Joe has spent 1.5 trillion dollars for 99 executive orders ❗ As congress controls the purse strings, t h a t should be illegal, and challenged NOW.
Biden gave his dark, divisive, speech on the "soul of the nation" at Independence Hall, Philadelphia, almost calling MAGA terrorists.
The FBI seized Mike Lindell's phone at a Hardee's drive thru in Minnesota. They asked him about Dominion voting machines in Colorado. Unconstitutional ❗

SCOTUS had a remarkable early 2022❗ WHO is the SCOTUS leaker❓ WE have not forgotten this matter.
SCOTUS begins hearing cases for the 2022-23 term October 3.

China announced more drills after the second bunch of dem politicians flew to Taiwan. Billions more US dollars sent to Ukraine.

Liz Cheney lost ❗ 👋

⛴️ ⛓️
Food shortages and supply chain issues abound. Robots are supposed to help fix it, says Peter Goodman, NYT. Here's a solution- Fire Mayor Pete❗ A railroad strike has been averted for now.

POTUS 45
Trump won the Dallas CPAC with 69% of the vote. His endorsed candidates have pretty much swept the primaries nationwide.
Merrick Garland (DOJ) authorized the FBI RAID on Mar-A-Lago with the knowledge and approval of the Biden White House. The "more than heavily" redacted documents were released.🙄
Raymond Dearie has been appointed special master.
Trump campaigned for NC Senate candidate Ted Budd in Wilmington to another overflowing crowd ❗

Durham Report
Can there be justice in DC?

It's World Rivers Day ❗

americanrivers org

_source.content: @bornfree10 Innocent Citizens Sue The FBI Over Illegal Security Deposit Box Raid  FBI Robs 800 Safety Deposit Boxes, Steal People’s Life Savings, Claiming Cash Smelled Like Drugs Not-So-Safe-Deposit Boxes: States Seize Citizens' Property to Balance Their BudgetsResources to Search for Unclaimed Property in Your NameBy ELISABETH LEAMYhttps://abcnews.go.com/print?id=4832471&fbclid=IwAR2vz1JwX3oGNjdaLzKUf7WvAhPVuPYnY9xxxz819vgqAv6BA96nqHssINM May 12, 2008 —The 50 U.S. states are holding more than $32 billion worth of unclaimed property that they're supposed to safeguard for their citizens. But a "Good Morning America" investigation found some states aggressively seize property that isn't really unclaimed and then use the money -- your money -- to balance their budgets.Unclaimed property consists of things like forgotten apartment security deposits, uncashed dividend checks and safe-deposit boxes abandoned when an elderly relative dies.Banks and other businesses are required to turn that property over to the state for safekeeping. The problem is that the states return less than a quarter of unclaimed property to the rightful owners.Not-So-Safe-Deposit Boxes Safety Deposit Boxes ConfiscatedPosted on December 5, 2008 by ScottFor my friends that are keeping their heirlooms, wills, gold/silver colored diamonds etc in a bank safety deposit box: please be careful. ABC News reported on a number of states that confiscate the contents of boxes to help fund their budget.https://meltdown2011.wordpress.com/2008/12/05/safety-deposit-boxes-confiscated/?fbclid=IwAR2WkgJZuE7OO7eaINNuArp8sF4nvZWLDJmTHLWNWwTn_D4jg5B9sqrEVVk .. Even though the boxes were fully paid up and the owner HAD NOT MOVED they were seized as “abandoned.”With California declaring a “fiscal emergency” a few days back do you think states will suddenly decide to stop this practice?  https://www.dailymail.co.uk/home/moslive/article-1222777/The-raid-rocked-Met-Why-gun-drugs-op-6-717-safety-deposit-boxes-cost-taxpayer-fortune.html?fbclid=IwAR0pPPfMdnZ1UTs-Wyaqm7oNl1xnYcQCr-6KPXBP200AFGXmLMuXQcI9Uyg h.  UK More than 500 officers smashed their way into thousands of safety-deposit boxes https://www.nbcphiladelphia.com/news/local/heirs-lose-fight-with-government-to-keep-dads-rare-1933-gold-coins/1907353/?fbclid=IwAR2f8dJmZzyCjWC_KexI0oBrJIxbHbu99JHzMpAHl44LUfx5NtEqimp0lJY Government Steals families rare gold coins found in safety deposit box! https://www.silverdoctors.com/gold/gold-news/gold-confiscation-begins-report-of-2-dozen-gold-krugerrands-stolen-from-safety-deposit-box-by-cia/?fbclid=IwAR2WkgJZuE7OO7eaINNuArp8sF4nvZWLDJmTHLWNWwTn_D4jg5B9sqrEVVk ..  Gold Confiscation Begins? Report of 2 Dozen Gold Krugerrands Stolen From Safety Deposit Box by CIA  https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-2287826/NatWest-lose-pensioners-safety-deposit-box-20-000-family-heirlooms.html?fbclid=IwAR3TExq0A269q1Kxo8IfTOKic4EMUON5Lc31eQAXW44u32ZfLpVZKLY7NrM . NATWEST BANK 'LOSES' SAFETY DEPOSIT BOX WORTH OVER $30,000!!UK bank Natwest has spent 6 months trying to locate a safety deposit box that contained family heirlooms and other valuables but has been unable to find it it, according to bank staff https://www.zerohedge.com/political/fbi-raids-business-renting-anonymous-safety-deposit-boxes-forces-customers-reveal?fbclid=IwAR2RP7Wy9O5167vjTPTc-V98kl0i0tHCr7JG80TFE6veETC8gUr-Cd6wYSo   FBI Raids Business Renting Anonymous Safety Deposit Boxes, Forces Customers To Reveal Identity To Get Stuff Back As civil asset forfeiture surpasses criminal theft FBI now seizing millions from safety deposit boxes without warrants. https://www.blacklistednews.com/article/80208/fbi-ignored-its-own-warrant-and-search-policies-to-seize-millions-from-peoples-safety-deposit.html?fbclid=IwAR0pPPfMdnZ1UTs-Wyaqm7oNl1xnYcQCr-6KPXBP200AFGXmLMuXQcI9Uyg . Who are the real crooks?In March of this year, the US Attorney in Los Angeles, California secured an indictment against a secure vault company, alleging the company was engaged in money laundering, drug trafficking, and hiding taxable assets. None of the company's employees or owners were indicted.FBI agents spent five days turning US Private Vaults upside down. Agents apparently emptied every safety deposit box housed by the business. They did this in complete contradiction of the limits imposed on them by the FBI's own warrant affidavit. Here's Eric Boehm of Reason with some background:[T]he unsealed warrant authorizing the raid of U.S. Private Vaults granted the FBI permission to seize only the business's computers, money counters, security cameras, and large steel frames that effectively act as bookshelves for the boxes themselves. Per FBI rules, however, the boxes could not be left unsecured in the vault after the raid had been completed, so agents had to take them into custody too.The FBI could have taken custody of the boxes without opening them and sought warrants for those implicated by the investigation. Instead, the FBI agents emptied the boxes while still on the premises, engaging in dozens of searches not authorized by any warrant.in apparent direct contradiction of the search warrant's limits and the FBI's own policies.[T]he FBI is now trying to confiscate $86 million in cash and millions of dollars more in jewelry and other valuables that agents found in 369 of the boxes.Prosecutors claim the forfeiture is justified because the unnamed box holders were engaged in criminal activity. They have disclosed no evidence to support the allegation. https://twitter.com/AmAust/status/1559197744593608704?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1559197744593608704%7Ctwgr%5Eebc0d1c23a3592489d6cd8714ca5591245ff3f3e%7Ctwcon%5Es1_&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.rumormillnews.com%2Fcgi-bin%2Fforum.cgi%3Fread%3D205684&fbclid=IwAR0105ANRcRt-UQKy0Lgudn556Jht5b8pNBmzPEJmoF_rHUdbQNmsULuB2E https://thefreethoughtproject.com/the-state/fbi-robs-800-safety-deposit-boxes-steal-peoples-life-savings-claiming-cash-smelled-like-drugs?fbclid=IwAR0dKCTQ_zX037B8pXfPuu1R8yZcVdGlxWFQmoa5-ywmPhcERMNkXb6RAho https://www.forbes.com/sites/instituteforjustice/2021/07/02/innocent-citizens-sue-the-fbi-over-illegal-security-deposit-box-raid/?fbclid=IwAR2RP7Wy9O5167vjTPTc-V98kl0i0tHCr7JG80TFE6veETC8gUr-Cd6wYSo
